description:
Monitors K3s cluster using Kube-Prometheus. Shows overall cluster CPU / Memory / Filesystem usage as well as individual pod, containers, systemd services statistics. Uses cAdvisor metrics only.

Origin from  dashboard: 8721(K8s RKE cluster monitoring) and will be compatible with k3s

targets.expr:
# Using available metrics - this should work
(
  sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{container!="POD",container!=""}) / 
  sum(machine_memory_bytes)
) * 100

panels.title: CPU usage rate across all containers

title: K3S cluster monitoring
